    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ArenaFactory
    Factory class responsible for creating environmental features within the game's arena.
    AttackFireball
    Represents a random event where fireballs appear on one edge of the screen and move towards a random point on the opposite edge.
    AttackZoneCircle
    Represents an attack zone in the form of a circle.
    Bullet
    Represents a bullet as a type of projectile in the game.
    DebugMode
     
    EntityType
    Enumerates different types of entities used in the game.
    FireballComponent
     
    GuidedRocket
    Represents a guided rocket as a type of projectile in the game.
    Gun
    Represents a gun weapon in the game.
    HazardFactory
     
    Main
     
    PlayerAnimationComponent
    Component that manages animations for a player entity based on its state and movement.
    PlayerComponent
    Component that manages all player-related interactions including movement controls, weapon handling, and collision responses such as knockback.
    PlayerFactory
    Factory class for creating player entities in the game.
    Projectile
    Abstract class representing the base functionality of a projectile in the game.
    ProjectileComponent
    Component responsible for handling the behavior of projectiles, including movement, collision detection, and impact effects in the game.
    ProjectileFactory
    Factory class for creating projectile entities in the game.
    RandomAttackEvent
    Abstract class defining a framework for handling random attack events in the game.
    ReversedBullet
    Represents a reversed bullet, a unique type of projectile in the game that features a negative knockback effect.
    ReversedRocket
    Represents a reversed rocket, a type of projectile in the game that features an exceptionally high reverse knockback effect.
    Rifle
    Represents a rifle weapon in the game.
    Rocket
    Represents a rocket, a type of projectile in the game known for its high impact and explosive properties.
    RocketLauncher
    Represents a rocket launcher weapon in the game.
    Sniper
    Represents a sniper rifle weapon in the game.
    Weapon
    Abstract class that defines the common properties and functionalities of weapons in the game.
    WeaponComponent
    Component for handling weapon-specific interactions and behaviors in the game.
    WeaponFactory
    Factory class responsible for the creation and management of weapon entities in the game.
